info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 19 at 12:53PM MST until August 19 at 3:45PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 345 PM MST. * At 1253 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms near Hildale producing heavy rain which will flow down Short Creek into Colorado City. Flash flooding is expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, Short Creek, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Colorado City. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
